attributes.action: Stop creating policy for the entire country based on what is going on in London and the South East
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to me that a lot of government policy, and specifically congestion, road pricing and public transport are based on the circumstances found in London and the South East, many communities both rural and in small towns feel agrieved that they should suffer what amounts to increased taxation when there is no viable alternative but to use the car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
